names.fullName: Oligomeric structures of poliovirus polymerase are important for function.

attributeList.attribute: Hobson SD., Rosenblum ES., Richards OC., Richmond K., Kirkegaard K., Schultz SC.
scott.hobson@cellzome.de
RNA binding was evaluated using a nitrocellulose filter binding assay. The amount of radiolabelled RNA bound to each membrane was quantified using a PhosphorImager
Residues renumbered to match full-length polyprotein for this virus.

names.fullName: Oligomeric structures of poliovirus polymerase are important for function.

attributeList.attribute: Hobson SD., Rosenblum ES., Richards OC., Richmond K., Kirkegaard K., Schultz SC.
scott.hobson@cellzome.de
Elongation assays evaluated using radiolabelled RNA as a substrate. Elongated products were separated by PAGE and visualised using a PhosphoImager
Residues renumbered to match full-length polyprotein for this virus.

names.fullName: Oligomeric structures of poliovirus polymerase are important for function.

attributeList.attribute: Hobson SD., Rosenblum ES., Richards OC., Richmond K., Kirkegaard K., Schultz SC.
scott.hobson@cellzome.de
2mM dithiothreotol added to reaction mixture, this was increased to 50mM for reducing conditions. Proteins seperated by SDS-PAGE and visualised by Coomassie staining
Residues renumbered to match full-length polyprotein for this virus.
